body.p:
To the Honorable gov, of Kentucky Mr Magoffin I have lived in Covington, Ky some 25 year and have bin acquainted with Hiram Alexander Some 15 year who was accused for the cutting of H. Overhouse as for his r Reputation for truth and honesty he stands un impeached overhouse never was hurt much prejudice amongst the Duch was the cause of Alexanders misfortune overhouse has enlisted and gone to swerve Abe Lincoln and we would not think the time long if he never was to return
it is the Belief here amongst the generality of the people that -- Alexander never interfeared with him in any way we there fore prey you if you can in your wisdom pardon him and let him return home again with his aged mother
I have Bin the Jailor of this place Some nine year this from your humble friend
